name: 黃希敏
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通能力，經由美國實境電視節目與合宜的活動設計，如小組討論具有深度與實用性的議題，使學生獲得充分機會來演練英語聽講的技巧以及適切的表達方式。
schedule:
01  Introduction
02  AP1: Summer of Sam’s Club
03  Role playing or storytelling 1
04  AP2: The Razor’s Edge
05  Role playing or storytelling 2
06  AP3: Get it in Gear
07  Role playing or storytelling 3
08  MIDTERM 1
09  MIDTERM 2
10  AP4: Cereal Killer
11  Role playing or storytelling 4
12  AP5: Cruise Control 
13  Role playing or storytelling 5
14  Field Trip to AIT
15  AP6: King of the Jingle 
16   Role playing or storytelling 6
17  FINAL 1
18  FINAL 2
scorePolicy:
1. Group discussion/report               25%
2. Role playing or storytelling          25%
4. Mideterm + Final (Individual)         50%
5. Spontaneous Q & A                     bonus points
materials:
1. Videos of ”The Apprentice” Series
2. Handouts of (1) important expressions extracted from the videos and (2) discussion questions related to the contents of the episodes
3. American Colloquialisms (book)
